QuestInfo.fullDiz: I can't just believe what my father told me. I need to see it for myself.
A drunkard from Cordan offered to give me the ananaga making technology if I show him Petro's recipe.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell the bartender of Sowth about the Felix's fate

QuestInfo.fullDiz: I bought the medications, now I just have to give them to Ben and hope for the best.
The bartender from Sowth convinced me not to follow Lisa, but to focus on finding Ben. The most logical place to start would be the city of Aeterna.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell everything to Lisa and Ben
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that my adventures have come to an end, it's time to share them with Lisa and Ben and decide what I should do next.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kill the raiders who took over the stash
Take a chance at the Small Land's bar
Tell everything to Lisa and Ben
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that my adventures have come to an end, it's time to share them with Lisa and Ben and decide what I should do next.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask in Porto about the caravan
Find out who Ben Throttle is
QuestInfo.fullDiz: My whole life has been turned upside down. To find myself, I must find my real father, no matter what! The only clue is the name Ben Throttle. Maybe someone at Sowth had heard of him?

The mechanic at Aeterna was frightened when he found out that Ben Throttle is an explorer, and told me to look for the village witch, because only she could know where his house is. Sounds crazy, but I had no other clues.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask Ben about Ivan and composite
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The Midgard master told me that many years ago someone with the initials A and G also ordered armor for the cabin from their shop. Maybe Ben knows where Ivan could obtain such a rare material?
I have an opportunity to become a co-owner of the Colosseum. For my investment, I will receive a share of the stock and a stable profit.
I need to deliver this package to Sowth. Merchant Sergo has some business with my father.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Destroy the remnants of the adepts

QuestInfo.fullDiz: There is no way to capture Moska. And if you can't capture something, the best solution is to blow it to hell. That's exactly what we'll do.
We may not have the numerical advantage and significant forces, but hitting Kateberg is the only thing we can do. I hope that fortune will be on our side.
I failed to protect the caravan from Midgard, and now I have to tell the city that the car was destroyed. I hope it won't ruin our relationship.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find the source of the strange noise
QuestInfo.fullDiz: There was some noise coming from the road to the east. Vasily and I decided to check out what was going on.
The Midgard master is taking a great risk by ordering contraband, so I'll have to personally collect the trader's stash in Vaterland.
Now that Marco has talked for me, Grandma has to forgive me.
The Adepts have kidnapped Lisa, and now I have to figure out how to get her out of there. To begin with, I have to understand what their motives are.
I need to take part in a demonstration battle at the Colosseum to attract the crowd.
Ben gave me a list of medicines I should buy in Midgard. I hope they will help Lisa wake up.

To help the people of South in the defense of the city, I need to deliver materials to build two pillboxes, which will take the major strike in the battle with the bandits, and then to fight this attack in the first ranks.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver materials to the first position
Deliver materials to the second position

QuestInfo.fullDiz: It is reported that the adepts are raiding the villages of the locals in search of the escaped prisoner. It is most likely that it was Lisa who escaped from them. I must protect those villages and get to Lisa before they do.

Rumours say that the archaeologists have dug up something interesting. They didn't spend much on guards, so me and my new criminal companion Dan can kidnap their leader and demand their discovery as a ransom.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring the prisoner to the hideout
Take Disc ¹2 to the Oracle
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that I have the second disc, I can finally decode my father's diary. Of course, to do that I'll have to go to the Oracle in Ignott.
The town %1n asks you to accompany the caravan up to %2n and offered to pay %3d.
An inhabitant of %1n asked me to defend the transport on its way to %2n and offered to pay %3d.
%1n demands me to accompany the transport carrying an important cargo to %2n. If it arrives safely, I will get %3d.
The transport from %1n goes to %2n. Some bandits often ambush traders coming that way, so I agreed to protect it for a mere %3d.
The town %1n asks you to destroy the enemy for a reward of %3d coins.
The citizens of %1n are often being attacked by the cunning brigand who always escapes punishment. I agreed to get rid of him for %3d.
I will get %3d, when I get rid of an outlaw that threatens %1n.
The town %1n will pay %3d coins for each enemy killed.
The bandits have lost all shame! We must teach them a good lesson. The people of %1n will pay %3d for every killed enemy.
The authorities of %1n began to fight for the safety of the trade routes. I will be paid %3d for every hostile vehicle slain.
For a modest percentage of my money, the faction %2b is willing to make peace with me.
The town %1n asked me to deliver package to %2n. Upon arrival, I will receive %3d.
I’ll get %3d, when I deliver the package to %2n. Somebody is waiting for it, but I am not going to hurry for such a modest reward.
Some crank from %1n is will to pay me %3d, if I go and say hello to his friend living in %2n.
Tell about the opening of the Colosseum to the citizens of Aeterna.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report the beginning of the revolution to Astria
Meet the Heretic at the monastery

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The Church of Enlightment must be overthrown from its reigning throne.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report the beginning of the revolution in Saraevo

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Because of my careless actions in the past, bandits from the Brigade took over Pesht. I must help the traders to recapture it.

As soon as I came out of the tunnel, I was immediately attacked by an unknown person, and after I defeated him, he suggested that I go to their headquarters. I definitely need to figure out what exactly is going on here.
The top CIT leaders are on the defensive in Egalite. We need to go there and attack the city.
I'm in luck: Ben Throttle lives nearby. I must meet him and find out what he has to do with me and the recent events.
Now that I can't go to Midgard, I have to find another way to find out about Ben's place. Maybe the village near Midgard can help me?
There's one last village I haven't been to yet. I think someone needs help there, too.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask in Volozh about suspicious travelers
Find the way to the snowy lands
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Most likely the path to the snowy lands must begin somewhere in Hel, and I know only one person in the region who might know something about it. It's time to visit Homer again, but it might be a good idea to stop by Sharky's before.
Probably, Homer may be found at the bar of one of the local settlements
Markeezytch told me that Homer is fishing not far from Saliniom. I should look along the coast.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Look for Homer along the coast
Give Homer a ride to Saliniom
Pick up stuff from an abandoned village

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that I have arrived in Sage Mountains, I need to find out where the sages live.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask about the sages in Ermakovo

QuestInfo.fullDiz: I can't believe my dad let me go into town alone. I have to get his truck out of the garage before he changes his mind!
Finally this man will tell me what the hell is going on here.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Free the leader of the Fishermen
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The Fishermen have taken over the storage. If I resque their leader, they'll let me take everything I need to travel to Lidencloud.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out in Olme where the leader is kept
Intercept the caravan moving the leader
Bring the leader to his people
Search for warm clothes in the storage

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now I have a composite, so there's nothing keeping me in these ice-covered lands anymore.
I have to tell Vsevolod that Dobroslava will not return to him. I hope he won't kill me on the spot after hearing this.
Now that we've managed to get some warm clothes, only a stone blockage separates me from the place where the composite can be found.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Clear the entrance to the tunnel

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that nothing else prevents me from crossing the bridge, I must go to the sages and find out from them where I can find the composite.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa at Moska's Bar
Evacuate the locals and go to the sages
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that the adepts have left Lidencloud, I must evacuate the locals.
One local raider is obstructing work of archeologists at a nearby dig site. I agreed to protect them from this bandit attempting to steal the unearthed treasure.
In order to gain the trust of the sages, I need to help three people from different places.
The adepts made me a condition that they would only let Lisa go and open the bridge if I helped them to eliminate the locals. I agreed.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Meet locals in a designated area
Destroy the last local resistance forces
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The executioner in Moska managed to squeeze out information about military equipment and the location of the villages of the locals from the Velimir's daughter.
Kill the tank men who attacked Glukhoe.
Tikhomir will not be able to fool me! I will kill him, and bring Dobroslava home safe and sound.

Entrepreneurs want to reopen the Colosseum. Unfortunately, their advertising budget is abysmally small. And they don't have a lot of experience. I agreed to help them in this difficult business anyway.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Meet Axel at the appointed place

QuestInfo.fullDiz: In addition to Rinolsk, there is another town whose residents need help.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out what happened in La Belle
Pull the bodies of the dead miners from under the rubble
Fight off the first wave of attackers
Fight off the second wave of attackers
Fight off the third wave of attackers
Fight off the fourth wave of attackers
Fight off the fifth wave of attackers

QuestInfo.fullDiz: There is only one challenge left that separates me from the composite.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa in the Volozh bar
Talk to Lisa in Sowth's bar
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The mysterious girl asked me to show her the countryside. I need to talk to her before deciding anything.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask Ben where Lisa might be hiding
QuestInfo.fullDiz: After Pesht, the Lisa's trail vanishes. I should ask Ben where she might be hiding.
Lisa has stolen my father's disc! It is urgent to find her before the trail goes cold. She could not have left these lands without passing through Pesht, so I should start the search from there.
In Zarmek, I stumbled upon a car wreck with an extremely familiar logo. I need to take a closer look at this car.
Tell about the Colosseum in Midgard. People there are sure to be excited to hear about the new entertainment destination.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask in Olme about the Sea Gate
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Olme is the last traders' town in the North. Maybe people there know something about the Sea Gate.
That's a hell of a thing. I don't know if I've ever seen anything like that...

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Check the place that Mr. Hat pointed out
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Maybe I'm going crazy, but I met a mysterious headless man in a bar who pointed out to me a place I should visit. It's very silly, but I'll go there.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Check out the place Mr. Hat was talking about
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The man without a head keeps following me. He wants me to go to another place and visit a mysterious cavern. I'm not sure if I need it...

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Check the place that Mr. Hat pointed out
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I'm getting pretty tired of wandering around and doing tasks for this fabulous creature, but something tells me that I need to find out what's out there.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Mr. Hat under the mountain in Librium
QuestInfo.fullDiz: How did he even get there?
I think it's a good idea to try my luck in a big city first. I'm sure there's someone there who needs my help.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask in the city if they need help
Find out what happened in La Belle
You didn't have medicine for Odette.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Perhaps if you had had a box of medications, things might have gone differently?

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out about the composite at the Colosseum
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Salvatore is going to slip into Midgard and erase the information about me. In the meantime, I can do another, equally useful thing.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask Salvatore about the success of the break-in
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The night has passed and Salvatore is already back. I should ask him how it went.
In all of Ridzin, I know only one person capable of sneaking into a major city with serious security and stealing what I need.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Wait for the end of the interrogation
Talk to the head of security in Marezzia
Ask the oilman what to do next
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that all the elders are dead, I have no more clues about Ivan's fate. The only thing left is to go back to the oilman.
Now that the evacuation route is known, it is worth informing the oilman immediately. I hope the locals have not yet discovered his hiding place.
Of the two of us, only Lisa's car is able to pass through the enormous gate that separates me from the lands of Lidencloud.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver Tuzz refugees to anti-militarist transport
Save civilians from being sent to war
QuestInfo.fullDiz: In Tuzz and Marezzia there goes a real hunt for ordinary citizens and undesirable figures. I cannot stop this madness, but I can try to save as many people as possible.
I need to apologize to Grandma for calling her a witch. But how can I do that if she won't open the door for me? I'll ask at the bar.
Tell about the Colosseum in Porto. Soon people from all the major cities will flock there in search of entertainment.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring the rebel leader to Marezzia

QuestInfo.fullDiz: I have found Ben.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deal with the signs in the fields
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Even lands as remote as Sage Mountains have not been unaffected by the mysterious phenomenon of signs in the fields.
Now that the Church of Enlightment no longer rules Argen, the war is in fact over. All that remains is to return to headquarters with a report.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return to the owner of the Colosseum
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I did my side of the deal. Now I have to collect my well-deserved reward.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return to the owner of the Colosseum
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I did my side of the deal. Now I have to collect my well-deserved reward.
Now that all the truth has been revealed to me, there is only one step left. I am ready for it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Give a ride to the fisherman to Olme
QuestInfo.fullDiz: A fisherman from Saliniom wants me to give him a ride to Olme, where he would be able to join the guards for the trade caravans.
The Velimir's daughter went to an abandoned factory to look for parts for boat engines and hasn't returned yet. I should check if the adepts got to her.
People are complaining about mysterious signs appearing in the fields. We need to get to the bottom of this.
Before going to Severka, Seraphima wants to collect some things from her house. I hope it's something really important.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the spy to the base

QuestInfo.fullDiz: There are mysterious signs on the Yarr' fields. Perhaps there is some logic in their appearance.
Now that my search is over, all business should be completed and then I should dive into a boring and relaxed life.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Ben and Lisa about the upcoming trip
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I got all the necessary materials for the master in Midgard, and he got to work. Now I need a way to pass the time. I think I'll stop by Ben's place.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell the scientists about the signs
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I have no idea what could have caused this strange phenomenon. Scientists in Midgard may be able to figure out what's really going on here.
Before I go into the desert, I'd like to stop at Sowth and see how things are going there.
I didn't feel like risking my life and going to Sowth on my own. I'd rather pay a local mercenary, Vasily.
Good time to go home after the successful deal.

According to the book that Ivan gave to the Bukharians, I will find all the answers to my questions near the iron bird that fell somewhere on the swamps of Hel. I should have a better look around that area.
I should stop by a one village in Hel. Who knows, maybe I'll meet someone I know there.
The adepts have captured the Velimir's daughter and are going to interrogate her in an abandoned factory. I have to go there and get the information we need.
The traders' storage, which contains the warm clothes I need, has been occupied by the locals. There must be some way to drive them out.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Destroy the CIT troops near the tunnel
QuestInfo.fullDiz: When the CIT forces on the border will be defeated, the security protocol will be triggered. This will allow us to eliminate all the top commanders at once.
One resident of Locus agreed to justify me in the eyes of Grandma if I will deliver a parcel to his friend in Yarr.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Give Grandma Paula a gift from Ben
Talk to bartender Dronn in Sowth
Help traders clear out the storage
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I gave up the idea of attacking the traders' prison caravan, and now I have to help them clean out the storage. Only then will I have access to the contents of the warehouse.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Pick up warm clothes from the storage
Bring rich farmer to the gas station
QuestInfo.fullDiz: One local, gnarly businessman asked me to take him to the gas station. I agreed, reluctantly.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Destroy the pillboxes on the approach to the base
QuestInfo.fullDiz: At first I must destroy the pillboxes guarding the Bridage's bridge to prevent a strike from the rear.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Meet the trader's army near the bandit base
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The leader of the trader's army suspended the mopping-up operation so that I could participate myself. I need to meet them at the arranged location
With the kind of fire support the traders gave me, I should be able to clear out the bandit base and get my father's disc back.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report the success of the operation to the colonel
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The operation of taking over the military base was successful, now I have to go back to Minin and report to the colonel.
Colonel Gibbons told me that Minin's caravanner wants to tell me something.
I am sure the protection for the cabin is ready, now all that's left is to mount it on my truck.
There is information that the CD are going to attack a humanitarian aid caravan. It is my responsibility to prevent this.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to the barman in Asgard
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It appears that the people of this town know their way through the mountains to the west.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Go to the bar and say the password
Ask the Asgard bartender about other shops with explosive
Buy some explosives at the miners’ village

QuestInfo.fullDiz: This cargo must be delivered at all cost. My mission is to accompany it and make sure nothing happens to it.
Now I have the explosives. All that's left is to mine the bridge.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Free the oil derrick from the bandits

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The last opponent is running away, it's not wise to attack him. I got to follow this one to the base and destroy the nest.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ben was last seen in Midgard
Find the entrance to the tunnel
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that I know, where the entrance to the tunnel is, there should be no problem in crossing it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk with Ben in his house
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Soon I'll meet Ben Throttle and learn the truth about my origins.
Most likely the bartender has the key to the tunnel, and might be willing to sell it, if I understand the rules of free market.
Soon Lisa will pay for all she has done! I know exactly where she is!
The trace, left by my father leads to the distant land, where the all-knowing Oracle lives.
My father may still be alive! I will find him no matter what.|Some leads may have been left at his house in Minin.

The barmaid at Celja told me that in addition to the CIT and CD, there is a third party who wants to resolve the conflict without bloodshed. They say they have settled somewhere in the north. Maybe I should look for their base?
The Crimson Dawn is enlisting new recruits. To become one of them is a sure way get closer to Axel.
The Commonwealth of Independent Towns needs help to fight with Axels’ forces. If I join them, we will crush the tyrant!
Somewhere in the far north the Sea Gate is located. The caravan from Minin will show me the way to that region.
The oil mine workers are sitting in the Minin’s bar doing nothing. I must convince them to return back to work.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find a place for the ambush
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Sooner or later, someone will use the tunnel. I will ambush him and get the key! Patience is of great importance here.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Follow the transport to the village of Gendenburg

QuestInfo.fullDiz: CD keeps receiving resources and manpower via the tunnel. Once captured, it will provide CIT with a firm link to the outside world while cutting off the enemy's supply lines. The tunnel’s guard must die for the sake of high ideals.
My actions did not go unnoticed. Soon I will meet with the high command of the CIT!
The moment of truth is near. Soon I will meet Axel face to face!
I have to eliminate the threat of bandits’ attacks to go through Pesht. The only way I can think of is to blow up the bridge leading to their base.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Free the oil derrick from the bandits
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I will need to restore the work of the oil mine, so that the people of Minin show me the way north.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Enlist the support of a major faction
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It sounds like trouble. Lisa is friends with some local crime leader. I don't think I can get to her without support. It’s high time to find some powerful allies.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Collect money to pay for crossing the bridge
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The bandits agree to let me pass trough their land for 10000 coins.
Small settlements are constantly under attack by Crimson Dawn thugs. I can prevent an attack, and I intend to do so.
A surviving bandit told me that the mayor himself was involved in the takeover of the oil derrick. I need to follow him to confirm this suspicion.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Destroy the car from the tunnel
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The surveillance failed. Now I need to destroy this car.
After a long conversation with Lisa at the bar, I agreed to show her the area.
After a long conversation with Lisa at the bar, I agreed to show her the area.
I must meet the rebels of Toskana and learn all they have to tell. With any luck, they have information that will help us to defeat Axel.
Now that the oil derrick is finally working, I'm able to drive further north.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring hired workers to the oil derrick
QuestInfo.fullDiz: As soon as I bring the workers to the oil derrick, they'll start working right away. That means that my trip up north will happen very soon.
I must find the entrance to the undersea tunnel that leads to the Oracle's land.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver the rebels’ leader to Tuzz
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I hope the information he has is worth all the sacrifices.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask for directions to Minin in Pesht

QuestInfo.fullDiz: That is the last piece of the puzzle. I managed to capture CD's general. In Egalite, they'll make him confess everything he knows.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Transport workers to the oil derrick
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now the workers are the masters of their own destiny. And they agreed to work on the oil derrick again.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Open the gate with the key
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I have the key to the tunnel’s gate. I only have to open it.
My first assignment is to patrol the border in case the enemy appears.
Surely I can negotiate with the workers in the nearby village. They should be willing to work at the mine for a small bonus.
After a good drinking, Petro decided it is time to punish the bandit who had been mistreating the local girls. I must help him do it!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return with transport to Tuzz and report back

QuestInfo.fullDiz: It’s time to return to Tuzz.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report to Sharky about the oil derrick
Try to cross the river somewhere else
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I need to get to the other side of the river. There are two bridges. One is the town Pesht, another one is at the bandits’ territory.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Follow the transport to the village of Egalite

QuestInfo.fullDiz: If I follow that car to its destination, I will probably find an occasion to steal the key.
Wherever the murderer is hiding, I’ll find and punish him!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to the Midgard's supply manager

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Accompanied by several elite CIT’s solders, I must capture Crimson Dawn’s general.
Someone in Minin must know about the Sea Gate.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return to the bar to Sharky
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Since the mayor of Minin is not interested in solving the city's problems, I'll have to talk to Sharky again.
Finally I can face the trickster Lisa in a fair fight!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Drive up to the ruins in Vaterland
Take the spy out of CD's hands
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Scouts report that one of the anti-militarist men has been exposed and is being searched for all over Argen. I must go there immediately and rescue him.
Philemon is probably drinking at a bar in one of the fishing villages. Or maybe not...
I have found Philemon, now all that's left is to bring him home.
The drunkard from Calis told me that Philemon had gone out to do roundels around the spruce on the Sacred Hill.
A woman asked me to bring her husband home. His name is Philemon, he's a bit unstable, and he likes to have a drink or two.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report the signs to the scientists in Midgard

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The druid mentioned strange signs. Let’s take a closer look.
The hermit druid is living alone far from friends. I should pay him a visit to say hello from an old friend.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring some rarity to the botanist
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I wonder where I can get rarities? Maybe I should look in the ruins...
I've been told there's an derelict hospital nearby. I think I might find something interesting there.
Despite the fact that the Colosseum did not have the material I needed, I could not refuse the offered fight at the Arena.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell the master in Midgard about the failure
Talk to the master in Midgard
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that the way to Midgard is open, I can finally get my truck ready for the harsh Desert environment.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the old archaeologist to the ruins of the Old World
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The old man asked me to take him to the ruins where he could do his research.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the old archaeologist to Midgard
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I need to take the old archaeologist I already know to Midgard, where he will share his discoveries with his colleagues.
On the way to Vaterland, I suddenly remembered dropping off an old archaeologist at the old ruins. I wonder if he's still there.
A strange young couple asked to bring them home. They offer a lot of money for such a simple task.
The Entertainment Center is a paradise, if the advertising slogans of the Pesht's barman don't lie.
The Oracle is completely mad. He's trying to destroy the Source and all its secrets. I cannot allow this to happen!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the disc away from the thief
QuestInfo.fullDiz: That thief doesn’t know who he's up against yet. The disc will be mine.
Everything is upside down at my father’s house. Somebody must have seen what had happened. I'll have to ask at the bar.
Lisa has stolen the amulet and the discs. I must catch her at all costs!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver second disc to the Oracle.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that I have both discs, I can finally learn about my father's fate. Hopefully, the contents of the diary will help me follow in his footsteps. Of course, that will require travelling to Ignott to see the Oracle.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Catch a fugitive in an abandoned city
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The people of the Lost village will pay me if I kill the leader of the bandits who destroyed the local Entertainment Center.
Only the Oracle may possess the weapon powerful enough to destroy the source of the contamination.
The thief has nowhere to go, but to Base 51. He'll try to sell the stolen goods somewhere where the scum hang out.
I need to hurry! I must find out in Asgard where Lisa went before the trail goes cold.
The way to the Sea Gate lays through the swamp. I must find the way to cross it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report on Bratislav to Supreme Sage
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I spent half a day digging waist-deep in the snow, only to find out later that the "vital" aggregate was a regular ananaga moonshiner.
A quite strange man from Rinolsk asked me to find three hidden parts for some machine he vitally needed.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Wait for Bratislav to make his best ananaga
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It turned out that Bratislav needed parts to repair his ananaga moonshiner, and he was hiding it from me because he was afraid of Supreme Sage's wrath. I agreed not to report on him away if he would make ananaga according to my recipes.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Do other things while Bratislav is making ananaga

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Someone stole a masterpiece from Aesthete. The only man who appreciates that kind of goods is Antique connoisseur
Someone by the name of Rogue is the organizer of this theft. I am to catch him and return the masterpiece to its owner.
To get a reward, I must return the masterpiece to Aesthete. However, there may be someone else to offer a higher price.
I am the only one who can stop the madness happening with the world. I will install the device that will lower the level of contamination. This is my destiny.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Go to Vahat by the sea

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The alien ship was hiding here the whole time. It is what emits the radiation that blocks the Oracle's signals. The enemy must be destroyed for the sake of humanity's survival.
Boss of Mafia can cause me a lot of trouble if he finds out I stole his merchandise. I should kill him before that happens.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return to partner with the cargo

QuestInfo.fullDiz: What luck! Due to a glitch at the station, the aliens have revealed the location of their base. Now I can talk to them.
Somewhere in the surrounding area of this power plant city is a source of emissions that is blocking the Oracle's signals. I must find out what we are dealing with.
I learned that the caravan with the precious cargo will soon go south almost unguarded. It is a good chance.
My mission is to infiltrate the resistance by pretending to be a CIT agent. I know the location and the password. That should be enough.
I have to return to Marezzia for a reward and a new assignment.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Turn to the side of the Crimson Dawn
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Instead of trying to get the spy out of the heat of the war, I decided that it would be much easier to bring him to Axel and get the information I needed firsthand.
Now I must attack the caravan with CIT supplies. Whatever I can steal is mine.
That old crook is about to break my cover! I cannot allow this.
I will fight Axel in the arena and force him to tell me everything I want.
They told me at the monastery that not long ago, Lisa left Argen for the power plant in Seil. I must hurry before she runs away from me again!
I need to deliver some wine from the monastery. But I think there's something shady about this simple task...
If I destroy several CIT’s vehicles at random, it will make the enemy nervous.
The people of this village have been seen to have contacts with the enemy. I will attack it to draw CIT forces away from the main line of offense.
The prioress has a mission for me. I must hunt down and kill the heretic and the pagan.
The rebel leader needs to stay alive. He can provide important information about the enemy's plans.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kill the CIT’s leaders during negotiations
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I lured the CIT’s leaders into the trap. Now I must kill them all to end this war. And to get a reward from the hands of Axel.
It finally happened! I am a war hero now and soon I will meet Axel! It's my only chance to get within shooting distance of him.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver the junk to a nearby village
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It's a dandy job to move cargo from one place to another. Not very exciting yet reward is considerable.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return the junk back to Marezzia
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The story of the old engine shipping is getting interesting. As soon as I passed it to the village, they handed it back to me with a request to take it back to Marezzia.
Surely, a new assignment is waiting for me in Marezzia.
Surely, a new assignment is waiting for me in Marezzia. I wonder if I am getting any closer to Axel.
I am ordered to kill all the rebels. I doubt if I should... it is a really evil deed...
I heard that the monastery nuns know more than they say. And if they are really hiding Lisa, she won’t escape this time!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell the scientists in Midgard about the signs
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The scientists of Midgard will surely get interested in the mysterious traces that appeared on the field. With any luck I will be rewarded for telling them.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take a look at the field
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I wonder what scared people so much. I think it’s worth looking at the field.
To earn the trust of the druids, I must cleanse their sanctuary from monsters. Weird, I always thought that the monsters don’t exist.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Get in touch with peaceful natives
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The first people I met there were not friendly at all. I should look for someone more peaceful.
This is my first time in these lands. I need to find the locals and ask them where to find the Oracle.
This is my first time in these lands. I need to find the locals and ask them where to find the Oracle.
I know the way to the Oracle now. Soon I’ll meet him.
No news has come from Uluk for some time. The druids ask me to find out what happened to its residents.
The Children of Iron plan to overthrow the druids and gain control under the island. That is why they want to kill the High Druid. If I help them, I will find out how to get to the Oracle.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring the Druid to the ambush

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Not all the people of Uluk submitted to the faith of the Children of Iron. Those who have remained true to the Druid faith are facing persecution. I simply cannot leave them to their certain death.
I was told that the High Druid, residing at Seth knows the Oracle whereabouts.
The diary shed light on my father's fate. Now I know for sure that I must look for him on the other side of the Desert of Death.
The Oracle Disciples will let me pass if the monster, living by the ruins, will be killed. As a proof, I must bring them its head.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find the City of the Dead

QuestInfo.fullDiz: It seems the Oracle is not as omniscient as he used to be. To restore his memory, we need to take the repair crew back to the specified locations.
Some strange fellows are guarding the way to the Oracle. I must pass them by somehow.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Upgrade the truck to cross the desert
QuestInfo.fullDiz: My truck needs to be modernized so I can cross the desert in it. I have the blueprint, so I need to find a craftsman to do the work.
The second disc may be hidden at my father’s house. I might have missed something the first time I was there. But now I know exactly what to look for.
Now that it is clear where my father has gone, it is time to go back to Lisa and discuss our future plans.
The Oracle will only talk to me if I bring him four artifacts from an abandoned factory.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask about the driver in Alikham
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The missing ferryman from Kef was last seen near the village of Alikham. I think I should start the search from there.
At Kef they told me that the elders were last seen in the old ship cemetery. Finally I would know where Ivan was going!
I managed to cross the Desert of Death! Now it would be nice to find a workshop. I can only hope that not all the locals are hostile.
Really strange people live here. I can't get anything out of them. I need to find someone who can answer my questions.
My father went in that direction - nothing else is known. I'll follow him and find out the truth about his fate.
I need to tell the people of Kef that they will never see the oil engineer again.

People of Kef are short of oil. Without it, the machines won’t work and the vehicles will not be able to patrol and protect citizens. I'll help them bring it in using a cistern truck. I have to wait until the expedition returns anyway.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa in the bar of Gadad
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It seems like Lisa has something to say to me.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa in the bar of Kef
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I need to convince Lisa that it would be safer for her to stay in town rather than coming with me.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa in the bar of Kef
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It seems like Lisa has something to say to me.
I hope, when I help these people, they will tell me where I can find what I need. Moreover, I cannot let them die just like that!
Lisa had recognized my stepfather's killers: they were the men in the tanks who live in Kef. We need to follow them.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring the blocker to the downed ship
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Njeri's device will be able to block the deadly radiation of the Source. But only if I install it in close range of it.
The alien ship is the source of contamination that almost wiped out the life on our planet. It must be destroyed for the sake of survivors.

All the tracks point to a military base. I need to take a good look around. But I don't think these guys are friendly. Even if it's a false lead, at least I'll clear this place of the lunatics terrorizing the area.
Sergo asked me to take a look around before he tells me the truth about my father. Well, I can do that, I'm in no hurry.
I hope Lisa wakes up if I take her out of the desert.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Sergo about the Source
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I saw this horrible place and could hardly move my feet. A terrible force drew me straight to the heart of the emission. Where the paralyzed people were already standing. Something must be done! Maybe Sergo knows how to stop this madness.
